text: KF Flamurtari Vlorë is a futsal club based in Vlorë, Albania. They have won the Albanian Futsal Championship three times since it was founded in 2003, and they are the current reigning champions. They are the futsal branch of the multi disciplinary Flamurtari Vlorë.UEFA profileUEFA Futsal Cup preliminary, main round draws == Honours == Albanian Futsal Championship (3): 2010–11, 2013–14, 2014–15 ==References== Category:Flamurtari Vlorë Category:Futsal clubs in Albania
title: Flamurtari Vlorë Futsal
